downloadTitle: MVP Session 3: Get Started with Shapes in Visio 2010 (working file)
downloadDescription: Practice quickly and accurately working with shapes in Microsoft Visio 2010 with this diagram, part of the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions, Video 3.
detailsSection: Practice quickly and accurately working with shapes in Visio 2010 with this diagram, created as a companion to the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions (http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions), Video 3. MVP Sessions Video 3 covers the basics of how to best work with shapes in Visio 2010. Use this working file to follow along with the video and practice how to quickly select, place, duplicate, space, rotate, and connect the different furniture, computer hardware, and network connection shapes in a typical office layout. You can use these skills and shortcuts when working with any drawing in Visio 2010.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the working file to your computer and then open it with Visio 2010.
additionalInformationSection: Watch the Get Started with Shapes video (http://visio.microsoft.com/en-us/Get_Started/How_To/Pages/Get-started-with-shapes.aspx).
